title: WTB: MINOR league cards & Horizontal T206
author: silvor

posts.post_title: WTB: MINOR league cards & Horizontal T206
posts.post_content:
Looking for minor league T206
I have a start on the set, but need 40 or so.


Also looking for the horizontal T206
Birmingham
Mullin (throwing)
Murphy (throwing)
Pattee
Pelty
Powell
Jack Dunn (I know, not technically horizontal, but...)

And while I'm at it...
Name on top and bottom T206.

SGC preferred, but PSA fine also.

Looking for mainly cards graded 4-5, but for the HOF's would consider 2-3 (because of price).  May consider higher graded ($$$) :) also.

I'm not really into backs, so Piedmont or Sweet Caporal backs are preferred.

Let me know the specifics via PM.

Thanks!

I have the following:
Josh Clark - Columbus SGC 4 Sweet Caporal $55
Bunk Congalton - Columbus PSA 4 Old Mill [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] SOLD
Send me an email address and I can send pics.
I have a beautiful Horizontal Mullen (Throwing) , but it's an SGC 40 VG 3. It looks like a much higher grade!!

Here's the scans
---color, contrast, centering all super! $125 delivered
